addContentObject.createTooltip: Hold {{modifier}} to add an additional Content Object.
addContentObject.description: Choose the name, namespace, and values of the Content Object you want to add.
addContentObject.fileFormatInfo: All files must be of the same type. The first file uploaded will determine the file type.
addContentObject.noDefaultLanguages: No languages are checked to be displayed in the Language Tool. This is the first language found.
addContentObject.noLanguages: No languages are present in the CMS. Add languages using the Language Tool.
addContentObject.title: Add Content Object

languageTool.description: Edit the languages of the CMS. Check the languages you want to be displayed.

languageBrowser.description: Select the language you want to add to the CMS.
languageBrowser.title: Language Browser

saveConfirmation.description: Saving will delete the following languages and all their values. Are you sure?
saveConfirmation.title: Confirm Save

languageTool.title: Language Tool

translationWizard.description: The value of the chosen source language is used to generate translations for the specified target languages of the selected Content Objects.
translationWizard.title: Translation Wizard

message.addFirstItem: Add your first Content Object to the CMS
message.emptyDetail: Select a Content Object to edit its values.
message.nameIsTaken: Name is already present in this Namespace.
message.noValues: At least one value must be present.

value.lastValue: The last value cannot be deleted
value.orDragAndDrop: or drag and drop to upload
